item.title: Code Test
item.author: Apollo_Roboto@outlook.com (Apollo-Roboto)
item.description: Inline Code. code block# some python code def display(value): print(f"== {value} ==") for x in range(50): if(x % 2 == 0): continue display(x) class Cube: def __init__(self, side): self.side = side// some C# code public static void Display(int val) { Console.WriteLine($"== {val} ==") } public static void Main(string[] args) { for(int x = 0; x < 50; x++) { if(x % 2 == 0) Display(x); } } public class Cube { public double Side {get;set;} public Cube(double side) { this.
